On May 22, 2017 7:54 AM, "Christophe ACACIA" > wrote:
Dear parents,

The months of July and August are coming near and we know that many among you will be going on vacations. During this period the centre ACACIA will be opened 2 weeks in July and 2 weeks and half in August. Our summer program will start on Monday 3rd July and ends on Wednesday 30th August. We will be closed from the 15th July to the 15th August for summer break.

During this period, we will function the same way as during the academic year. As part of our immersion program, your child will be in constant contact with French and English. Through various activities based on games, art, songs and stories, the centre will continue to develop your child's skills in both languages. Each week a different theme is chosen and the activities offered to the children will follow the theme.

In order for us to organize the program and logistics, we would need to know the weeks in which you would like to put your child at Acacia.

During this period, we offer you a weekly formula. Our fees will be calculated at the same rate than our school fees for those that has been already registered during the school year.

Please find attached a questionnaire. We will also put this questionnaire in the bag of your child. Thank you for taking the time to fill it up even if you do not wish to register your child(ren) during this period.

Yours Sincerely,

Christophe GALIAN
